statements: DELETE FROM transportation_costs WHERE weight_kg > 500 AND cost_per_km < 0.05;
DELETE FROM transportation_costs WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND distance_km > 500 AND cost_per_km < 0.5
DELETE FROM transportation_costs WHERE weight_kg BETWEEN 100 AND 200
DELETE FROM parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'distance' AND parameter_value > 100
DELETE FROM distance_matrix WHERE destination_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM transportation_costs WHERE id = 1 AND distance > 100.5
DELETE FROM distance_matrix WHERE source_location = 'City A' OR distance < 50
DELETE FROM transport_costs WHERE route_id = 50 AND vehicle_id = 200;
DELETE FROM routes WHERE driver_id = 3 AND vehicle_id = 5;
